itunes:title: AUG 4, 2022 - JAMES O’KEEFE: WHY I’M SUING THE NY TIMES AND CNN
title: AUG 4, 2022 - JAMES O’KEEFE: WHY I’M SUING THE NY TIMES AND CNN
description:
EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW with the man, the myth, the legend - James O’Keefe, founder of Project Veritas. Poso and O’Keefe discuss Project Veritas’ legal cases with the New York Times and CNN for defamation. O’Keefe dissects the difference between facts and opinions, and calls Jack Posobiec one of the “TOP 10 THREATS”. 


Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


To get $150 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ go to PrepareWithPOSO.com
